name: MythofMe
tag_list: life-story, story-telling, creative-writing, reminiscing, journaling, nostalgia
overview:
MythofMe is an online set of tools to help you write, collate, edit, update, share, print, and archive your digital life-story.

MythofMe answers a need in the 50 year-old+ demographic to review one’s life and leave a thoughtful legacy to ones’ family and friends. For those without prior literary experience, and/or minimal online experience, MythofMe offers a guided set of questions that reach the user via email. The email replies are collected to form a story line which is then returned to the user upon completion of each chapter. To the more internet savvy user MythofMe offers a range of editing, sharing, and printing tools.

MythofMe markets its service directly to its target demographic but also to a younger group keen to invite their parents to record their memoirs.

MythofMe also offers a nascent service to the very young (with parental guidance) as a means to process and express their feelings, MythofMiniMe.
